metadata.name: Buscemi Beats #0001
metadata.description: Music producer, composer and DJ, Buscemi has joined forces with the web3 studio 49/META to create the Buscemi Beats NFT Collection. Through this revolutionary music NFT project Buscemi is exploring new way of collaboration and co-creation between audiences and musicians. The Buscemi Beats collection conceptualizes the unique groove of Buscemi in five vibrant themes: French Bossa, Miami Latin, Oriental Asian, Balkan Love and Afro vibes and through a series of iconic artwork by the renowned design duo Loulou & Tummie.
